name: Rave Rough!
storyline: The year is 50XX, humanity is gone and the only remanence of them is music. Aliens invaded Earth a while after the extinction and built their society around humanity's music culture. However that's wayyy too much dramatic backstory! In the present, the biggest musician in the world is holding a massive contest. The prize? The Ultimate Sample CD!! Whoever gets to the top of his private HQ first, wins! This little contest gets the attention of mania amateur DJ, including our protagonist Scat who'll do anything for it!
summary: Rave Rough is a comedic and chaotic puzzle platformer about chucking your exposable vinyl collection to bounce your way throughout many platforming challenges! All the while butting heads with wacky friends and foes! Levels are very open ended and the moveset compliments this, with you having a lot of freedom to tackle challenges in all sorts of different ways.
